Line1.B79B7: Tracked and observed the madmen at Yngovani. While it does appear the cultists have learned to live among the snakemen, they don’t seem to cooperate in any way other than a mutually parasitic relationship.
Line3.B79B7:
If the cultists are directing the snakemen somehow, I still can’t see it. Perhaps they're nurturing them in some way? I’m going inside the lair to have a closer look.
-Elodin of Backwater
